entry.title: Hello World
entry.content: Hello World This is my personal blog. Mainly about technology learning and thinking, but not limited to this. Insist on originality, Update aperiodically. ¶ Code 1234567// Javaclass HelloWorld { public static void main() { System.out.println("Hello World!"); }} 1234567// C#include "stdio.h"int main() { printf("Hello World!\n"); return 0;} 1234567// C++#include "iostream"int main() { std::cout << "Hello World!" << std::endl; return 0;} ¶ Note Hello World! Hello World! Hello World! Hello World! Hello World! Hello World! ¶ Image ¶ PDF
